Organic Jaggery Powder is produced from sugarcane cultivated in organic farms spread across India without application of chemical fertilisers or pesticides. Processing is done without using any toxic and harsh chemicals used to clarify cane sugar. In China, black rice is claimed to be good for the kidney, stomach, and liver. Black rice has a deep black color and usually turns deep purple when cooked.
